title: Ponyo On a Cliff By the Sea - English Hardsubbed
description:
An animated adventure centered on a 5-year-old boy and his relationship with a goldfish princess who longs to become human.

A great new Hayao Miyazaki movie by studio Ghibli, great artwork, hardsubbed in english by me, all sync'd up =]

101 mins long

In 2009, Ponyo won five awards at the 8th annual Tokyo Anime Awards. The awards included "Anime of the year" and "Best domestic feature". Miyazaki received the award for best director and best original story, and Noboru Yoshida received the award for best art direction.

Seed&Enjoy!
